ml.alternet.security.web.server

Interface PasswordFieldMatcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WebappPasswordFieldMatcher

    public interface PasswordFieldMatcher
    According to the Web application configuration, determine whether an incoming HTTP request contains passwords to capture.

    A typical matcher will check whether the URI request will match some given paths.

    Author:
    Philippe Poulard

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationMethod getAuthenticationMethod(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
      Indicates whether HTTP Basic | Form authentication has to be processed for a given request.
      Optional<List<String>> matches(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Check whether an HTTP request matches this matcher, and return the list of passwords fields that have to be captured in a request.

    • Method Detail

      • matches

        Optional<List<String>> matches(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Check whether an HTTP request matches this matcher, and return the list of passwords fields that have to be captured in a request.
        Parameters:
        request - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        If the request matches the configuration, return the list of field names.

      • getAuthenticationMethod

        AuthenticationMethod getAuthenticationMethod(javax.servlet.ServletRequest request)
        Indicates whether HTTP Basic | Form authentication has to be processed for a given request.
        Parameters:
        request - The HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The authentication method.
